properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v1 v5

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord have mercy, Lord have mercy
On your servants, Lord have mercy

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
God almighty just and faithful
Lord have mercy, Lord have mercy

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Christ have mercy, Christ have mercy,
Gift from heaven have mercy

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
light of truth light of justice.
christ have mercy, christ have mercy,

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
God almighty just and faithful
Lord have mercy, Lord have mercy.
